import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from 'src/app/core/models/user'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/core/services/auth/auth.service'; import { UsersService } from './../../../core/services/users/users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'] }) export class UsersComponent { allusers: User | undefined getAllusers: any constructor(private user: UsersService, private auth: AuthService ){} getAlluser() { this.getAllusers.getDeclaration(this.allusers?.id).subscribe({ next:(data: any)=>{ console.log(data) this.getAllusers=data; }, error:(err: any)=>{ alert("erreur") } //console.log(this.declarationData); } )} }
